name: Sacrifices must be made!
description:
After accidentally opening a gateway to hell, you must face the threat of Demons invading the Earth. You bargain with Beelzebub himself, who demands sacrifices, in return, he agrees to close the gateway, however, if you don't sacrifice fast enough, he will unleash his demon army upon the planet. 

How to play -

Chase as many sheep as you can into the gateway before the time runs out. Each sacrifice buys you an additional 10 seconds to save the planet. Act fast and pray the demon will keep his word. 

Controls: 

W/S - Walk

A/D - Turn

Mouse - Rotate camera

Escape - Pause
